articles.title: Europe's leaders back Trump call for frontline freeze but Russia says no - BBC
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov rejects the idea of halting the conflict at the current contact line.
articles.content: European leaders have joined Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelensky in insisting that any talks on ending the war in Ukraine should start with freezing the current front line, and warned that Russia is not ser… [+4393 chars]
